articles.title: Krishna lifts brother Tiger Shroff on her shoulders. Watch what happens next - India Today
articles.description: Krishna Shroff has shared a video where she is seen lifting Tiger Shroff on her shoulders. Ayesha Shroff dropped a comment on the post.
articles.content: The Shroff family is obsessed with fitness and fans have many times seen Tiger Shroff perform gravity-defying stunts with ease at the gym. While Tiger keeps impressing fans with his high-kicks, his s… [+1346 chars]

articles.author: Nirupama
articles.title: Malaika Arora Snapped In Shorts At Yoga Studio - Gulte
articles.description: Malaika Arora looks ageless in her yoga shorts at Diva Studio today. Irrespective of her busy schedule and tiring day, the actress makes sure to hit the gym and yoga to keep herself toned and flexible. She is such a self-care master!
articles.content:
Published by GulteDesk
March 24, 2021

articles.author: Rishabh Suri
articles.title: Nitesh Tiwari on National Award for Chhichhore: I can only imagine how happy Sushant would have been if he was here with us - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Director Nitesh Tiwari remembers his film’s leading man as his film Chhichhore has been declared Best Hindi feature film at the National Film Awards.
articles.content: Nitesh Tiwari was in the middle of an ad commercials shoot when his wife, filmmaker Ashwiny Iyer Tiwari came running and started screaming in joy. National Film Awards had just been announced on Mond… [+1859 chars]
